alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and central Broward Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 to near Intersection Krome And U.S. 27 to near Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Sunrise, Weston, Doral, Hialeah Gardens, Medley, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Pennsuco, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, The Hammocks, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, Miccosukee Resort, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Tamiami and East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
